Posts.Content: Feb 5, 2011 09:35AM Betsy22 wrote: Hello ladies:  I find the Patient Resource Cancer Guide to be an outstanding resource for patients, caregivers and I know many medical pros rely on it as well.  Facilities listed do not PAY to be included - that is not the objective of this resource at all.  If in fact a treatment facility is not included, it's likely because they did not go online to add or update their information.  The publisher of this invaluable resource is herself a bc survivor.  It's her company's mission to fight this disease with information and create a community of empowered patients.  I also believe that access to info is critical.  It truly is a comprehensive guide and I encourage everyone to pick up a FREE copy in their doc's office or request a FREE copy online at www.PatientResource.net.  Thanks.
Posts.Title: Patient Resource Cancer Guide ddlatt Betsy22
